channel.title: Understanding Current Events
channel.description: כל שבוע אסקור לכם כתבות מעניינות ואלמד אתכם אנגלית בצורה קלילה וכיפית.
channel.itunes:author: יוני כהן

item.title: Understanding Current Events
item.description: In this episode, we talk about recent events in Iran and Israel. Learn about changes in military alerts and what is happening in Tehran. Hear about important figures and how they influence people. Stay tuned for more insights into today's news.
item.itunes:author: יוני כהן
